# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/)

## [2.1.0] Aug 21, 2023

### Breaking Change

### Feature

- Create documentation for the endpoints and function documentation
- Add docker files

### Fix

- Edit readme
- Fixed database so it works with docker and add env file
- Update docker compose file

## [2.0.0] Aug 20, 2023

### Breaking Change

- Updated frontend to a working React application.

### Feature

- Add open source files: README, CHANGELOG, CODE_OFCONDUCT, CONTRIBUTING
- Add some basic design to the frontend

### Fix

- Deleted unnecessary .gitignore file. 


## [1.0.0] Aug 19, 2023

### Breaking Changes

- Setup React project for the frontend. 
- Setup basic backend for the project.
- Initial commit and added .gitignore file. 

### Feature

### Fix
- Updated routes in the frontend.
